Title: RPLWork
Description: My portfolio site. The site that you're on right now! Web server made using the dotnet framework. Packaged and distributed using nix flakes.

Title: SpheresOfFun
Description: A Godot project. Godot is an open source game engine. Used this project to learn nix and its experimental flake feature. Game development presents unique challenges; asset management and package distribution to multiple platforms. Nix is well suited to help solve these problems.

Title: SocialNexus
Description: Implements a SaaS example using Azure AD B2C. Secure distribution using the OAuth 2.0 standard. Completed for my Capstone project at UW Bothell.

Title: ARM Cortex-M, Sys_Alarm and Sys_Malloc
Description: Wrote Assembly code to implement core functionality for an emulated Arm Cortex-M processor. Worked as a team to delegate work and accomplish challenging goals.

Title: Unity Engine, Technical Demo
Description: A walk through on using Unity's Input System. Complete at UW Bothell for CSS385, game development. Show cases my ability to create documentation using README.md files
